sentences.sContent: A dynamic self-learning efficient intrusion detection model was proposed based on inductive reasoning.
sentences.sContent_eng: A dynamic self-learning efficient intrusion detection model was proposed based on inductive reasoning.
sentences.sCn: 提出了一种基于归纳推理的动态自学习的高效入侵检测模型。

sentences.sContent: The paper deals with the role that perceptional similarity and category concepts play in infants' inductive reasoning.
sentences.sContent_eng: The paper deals with the role that perceptional similarity and category concepts play in infants' inductive reasoning.
sentences.sCn: 文章探讨了知觉相似性和类别概念在幼儿归纳推理中的作用。
